errors.error_description: Invalid command syntax using setup.py install instead of proper installation method
correction_candidates: To run the telemetry display program, first execute `pip install -e .` then run `python -m mimic --config config.json`
To run the telemetry display program, first execute `python -m pip install .` then run `python main.py --config=config.json`
To run the telemetry display program, first execute `pip install .` then run `python main.py --config config.json`
To run the telemetry display program, first execute `python setup.py develop` then run `python src/main.py --config config.json`
errors.golden_answer: To run the telemetry display program, first execute `pip install .` then run `python main.py --config config.json`
